actions.text: Amendment SA 1260 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1260 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S9391-9392; text: CR S9391) To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $3,500,000 may be used for National Consortia on MASINT Research.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1260 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1260 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

purpose: To make available from amounts available for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $3,500,000 may be used for National Consortia on MASINT Research.
